module.pgpcrypto.control

Class PGPCryptoUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • module.pgpcrypto.control.PGPCryptoUtils

  • class PGPCryptoUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides static methods for encryption and decryption of byte arrays and streams.

      • createRandomArray

        public static byte[] createRandomArray(int size)
        Creates an array containing random data of given size.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the byte[]

      • decryptAndVerifyByteArray

        public static byte[] decryptAndVerifyByteArray(byte[] in,
                                               org.bouncycastle.openpgp.PGPPublicKeyRingCollection pubKeyCollection,
                                               org.bouncycastle.openpgp.PGPPublicKey signPubKey,
                                               org.bouncycastle.openpgp.PGPPrivateKey encPrivatKey,
                                               CryptoActionInfo info)
                                        throws java.io.IOException,
                                               GpgCryptoException,
                                               org.bouncycastle.openpgp.PGPException
        Decrypts and verifies a byte array.
        Parameters:
        in - the input stream to read from
        pubKeyCollection - the pub key collection
        signPubKey - the signature public key
        encPrivatKey - the encryption privat key
        info - the object to store info (like key ID)
        Returns:
        the decrypted byte array
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O exception has occurred
        GpgCryptoException - if an internal problem occured or if the encryption is invalid
        org.bouncycastle.openpgp.PGPException - if a problem within the PGP subsystem occurred

      • encryptAndSignByteArray

        public static byte[] encryptAndSignByteArray(byte[] in,
                                             org.bouncycastle.openpgp.PGPPublicKeyRingCollection pubKeyCollection,
                                             org.bouncycastle.openpgp.PGPPublicKey ownPubKey,
                                             org.bouncycastle.openpgp.PGPPrivateKey signPrivatKey)
                                      throws java.io.IOException,
                                             org.bouncycastle.openpgp.PGPException
        Encrypts and signs a byte array.
        Parameters:
        in - the decrypted byte array
        pubKeyCollection - the public key collection
        ownPubKey - the own public key
        signPrivatKey - the signature private key
        Returns:
        the encrypted byte array
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O exception has occurred
        org.bouncycastle.openpgp.PGPException - if a problem within the PGP subsystem occurred

      • getDecryptedInputStream

        public static java.io.InputStream getDecryptedInputStream(java.io.InputStream encryptedIn,
                                                          byte[] keyBytes,
                                                          byte[] ivBytes,
                                                          int macSize)
                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Gets an decrypted input stream.
        Parameters:
        encryptedIn - the encrypted input stream to read from
        keyBytes - the key bytes
        ivBytes - the iv bytes
        macSize - the MAC size
        Returns:
        the decrypted input stream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O exception has occurred

      • getKeyring

        public static org.bouncycastle.openpgp.PGPKeyRing getKeyring(java.io.InputStream keyBlockStream)
                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Gets a key ring from an input stream.
        Parameters:
        keyBlockStream - the input stream to read key ring from
        Returns:
        the keyring
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O exception has occurred

      • getOutputStreamToEncryptTo

        public static java.io.OutputStream getOutputStreamToEncryptTo(java.io.OutputStream encryptedOut,
                                                              byte[] keyBytes,
                                                              byte[] ivBytes,
                                                              int macSize)
                                                       throws java.io.IOException,
                                                              java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                                              java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException,
                                                              java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                              java.security.NoSuchProviderException,
                                                              javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException
        Gets an output stream to write decrpted data to. This data is encrypted.
        Parameters:
        encryptedOut - the output stream encrypted data is written to.
        keyBytes - the key bytes
        ivBytes - the iv bytes
        macSize - the MAC size
        Returns:
        the output stream to write to
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O exception has occurred
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - if the key is invalid
        java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - the a parameter is invalid
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the selected algorithm is not available
        java.security.NoSuchProviderException - if the selected provider is not available
        javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException - if the selected padding is not available
